articles.title: DPRK Notifies Japanese Side of Its Stand on Grave Political Provocation and Encroachment on State Sovereignty
articles.content:
DPRK Notifies Japanese Side of Its Stand on Grave Political Provocation and Encroachment on State Sovereignty
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The DPRK sent a notice to the Japanese side on Thursday through diplomatic channel, clarifying its stand on Japan's grave political provocation and encroachment on the state sovereignty of the DPRK which are going beyond tolerance limit.
					 Recalling that the DPRK is sincerely implementing the DPRK-Japan Stockholm Agreement, the notice said that Japan is internationalizing the abduction issue and hyping it as a main issue at the UN human rights forum in violation of the agreement in which both sides decided to settle the issue, thus making it hard to trust the dialogue partner.
					
					 Strongly denouncing the Japanese police for perpetrating the unheard-of encroachment on the sovereignty of the DPRK by searching the houses of the leading officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan who are deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, the notice demanded the Japanese government make a thoroughgoing probe into the case and make an apology.
					
					 Under such situation it is hard to hold DPRK-Japanese inter-governmental dialogue, it said.

articles.title: DPRK Will Mercilessly Punish Those Joining in Evil Operations against It: CPRK Spokesman
articles.content:
DPRK Will Mercilessly Punish Those Joining in Evil Operations against It: CPRK Spokesman
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- As reported, there took place recently a domestic and foreign press conference with spies of the puppet Intelligence Service of south Korea. Those spies were unmasked and arrested while perpetrating espionage against the DPRK in a bid to do harm to its supreme leadership and bring down its socialist system.
					 However, the puppet group is urging the DPRK to "free and immediately repatriate" the thrice-cursed ones unmasked and arrested at the scene of crimes, not content with noisily talking about "groundless evidence and claim" and "detention of south Korean inhabitants."
					
					 The puppet group also egged conservative religious bodies on to noisily claim that what the thrice-cursed criminals did was "only missionary work to help the poor in the north." Conservative media and experts and even human scum are getting zealous in inciting confrontation with fellow countrymen and pulling up the DPRK, letting loose such invectives that "the north lured and abducted south Koreans" in a bid to "use them as hostages for playing a strategic card, shift the blame for the 'Cheonan' warship sinking onto the south and foment discord among south Koreans."
					
					 The puppet group's noisy trumpeting about "allurement and abduction" far from making a sincere apology for the thrice-cursed crime is, indeed, the height of shamelessness and another thrice-cursed provocation against the DPRK, says a spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) in a statement on Thursday.
					
					 The statement goes on:
					
					 The successive south Korean puppet regimes ceaselessly perpetrated espionage, subversive and conspiratorial acts against the DPRK and pretended ignorance and employed all sorts of sleight of hand whenever truth behind them was brought to light. 
					
					 The puppet group denied its thrice-cured crimes but resorted to red herring operations to deceive the public when their spies were unmasked and arrested in the DPRK, as evidenced by the case of those who were arrested while scheming to demolish monuments to the immortality of the leaders erected in praise of them in the DPRK that are symbolic of its supreme dignity and the case of Kim Jong Uk, a spy of the puppet Intelligence Service unmasked and arrested after infiltrating into the DPRK last year.
					
					 As such puppet regime's stereo-typed method has already been fully exposed to the world, even the recently arrested IS spies vehemently denounced the regime at the press conference, saying the regime might deny again all the facts if the truth behind their crimes were brought to light there.
					
					 If the puppet regime continues denying its fully exposed thrice-cursed crimes and resorting to confrontation racket, the DPRK will go on opening to public other evidence and information to shed light on terrorism plotted by the puppet regime and truth behind its conspiratorial moves.
					
					 The DPRK will unmask and mercilessly punish to the last those who joined in espionage, subversion, terrorism and abduction operations against the DPRK to dare hurt the dignity of its supreme leadership and its socialist system, no matter who they are, what masks they are wearing and where they are in hiding.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates to Nigerian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates to Nigerian President
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, in a message on Thursday congratulated Muhammadu Buhari upon his election as president of Nigeria.
					 The message said that Buhari's election was an expression of deep trust reposed by the Nigerian people in him.
					
					 It expressed belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations would grow stronger in various fields.
					
					 It sincerely wished the new Nigerian president good health and happiness and successes in his future work for consolidating the peace and security of the country and achieving socio-economic progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets New Russian, Qatari Ambassadors
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets New Russian, Qatari Ambassadors
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong separately met and had talks with Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Alexandr Matsegora and Qatari Ambassador to the DPRK Sultan Salmeen Saeed Al Mansouri who paid courtesy calls on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.

articles.title: State Academic Degrees and Titles Awarded to Intellectuals
articles.content:
State Academic Degrees and Titles Awarded to Intellectuals
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- State academic degrees and titles were conferred on intellectuals on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The title of academician went to Kim Jae So, researcher at Kim Il Sung University, and the title of candidate academician to Sim Kwang Chol, deputy rector of Phyongsong University of Coal Industry, Song Han Jong, teacher at Wonsan University of Fisheries, and Jo Tae Il, researcher at the Academy of Social Sciences.
					
					 Professorship was awarded to four intellectuals, doctorate to more than 80 and associate professorship to 147.
					
					 They made great contributions to building an economic power and improving the people's living standard by putting different fields of national economy on a modern and IT basis of Korean-style and waging a drive to push back the frontiers of latest science and technology.
					
					 The awarding ceremony took place at the People's Palace of Culture Thursday.

articles.title: Joint Survey of Migratory Birds to Be Launched in DPRK
articles.content:
Joint Survey of Migratory Birds to Be Launched in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The Nature Conservation Union of Korea is planning to make a joint survey of migratory birds with Miranda Naturalists Trust of New Zealand.
					 The survey will be launched in May, according to the agreement signed between two sides in Juche 103 (2014).
					
					 An official concerned said that the survey will be carried out in the areas of Nampho and Onchon.
					
					 The Miranda Naturalists Trust of New Zealand is going to confirm the migration course of Calidris Camupus which is at a crisis throughout the world.
					
					 In April 2009, the Miranda trust made a survey of Calidris tenuirostris, Ardea cinerea and other migratory birds in the DPRK.

articles.title: Online Commercial Service Begins in DPRK
articles.content:
Online Commercial Service Begins in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Online commercial service system, called "Okryu", is run by the General Bureau of Public Service in the DPRK.
					 Citizens can make a search for their necessities like consumer goods and medicines even with mobile phone after joining in the system and ask for delivery. 
					
					 Jong Sol Hwa, an official of the general bureau, told that the system helps consumers easily purchase their necessities at a lower cost.

articles.title: Standard Substances Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Standard Substances Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The Central Experiment Analytical Institute under the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK has recently developed tens of kinds of analytical standard substances.
					 Those substances accord with technical indices set by the International Standardization Organization (ISO).
					
					 According to Ri Kun Sam, vice-director of the Institute, their characteristic values were certified as world level after twice comparative tests by the ILAC.

articles.title: Sports Contest for Mangyongdae Prize Opens
articles.content:
Sports Contest for Mangyongdae Prize Opens
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The Sports Contest for Mangyongdae Prize opened with due ceremony on Thursday at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 It will be held in Pyongyang, Phyongsong City of South Phyongan Province, Haeju City of South Hwanghae Province, Tongrim County of North Phyongan Province and other places. Its participants will compete in dozens of events including, football, basketball, volleyball, table tennis, weightlifting, wrestling, Korean wrestling, ground hockey and field and track.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were members of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, officials concerned, sportspeople and other working people in the city.
					
					 Kim Yong Hun, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, made an opening address.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony there took place a men's volleyball game between the Amnokgang Team and the Pyongyang City Team.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Terms U.S. Worst Cyber Attacker
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Terms U.S. Worst Cyber Attacker
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the U.S. House Homeland Security Committee at a seminar sponsored by the U.S. Centre for Strategic and International Studies on Mar. 17 had the effrontery to admit that it was the U.S. which mounted a cyber attack on the computer network of the DPRK in December last year.
					  U.S. agents already infiltrated into the computer network of the DPRK several years ago and have run the whole gamut of base espionage to obtain information about its nuclear development, etc. 
					
					 Truth behind such espionage has already been exposed to the world by a declassified document of the U.S. National Security Agency, testimonies made by former senior officials of the U.S. administration and U.S. media.
					
					 The targets of U.S.-sponsored cyber terrorism are not confined to the DPRK.
					
					Cyber attacks are made by the U.S. against most of the countries and regions in the world including anti-U.S. countries, such regional powers as Russia and China, Germany and other competitive allies of the former.
					
					It was none other than the U.S. which perpetrated state-sponsored cyber terrorism, the first of its kind, by mounting a cyber attack by use of the malignant virus Stuxnet upon the computer network of an Iranian nuclear power plant in 2010. It was again the U.S. that is working hard to turn cyberspace into a theatre of war.
					
					 Heads of state and government organs and key businesses of various countries have become targets of the NSA's wire-tapping.  Confidential information being stored in governments' and personal computers are being hacked by U.S. agents to help the White House shape its policies.
					
					 Such hacking attack of the U.S. is an act for igniting a war of aggression as it is aimed at carrying out its cyber military strategy to all intents and purposes.
					
					 The keynote of the strategy being pursued by the U.S. is to mount a preemptive cyber attack on a certain target through internet.
					
					 To this end, the U.S. already advanced the conception of cyber warfare early in the 1990s and has stepped up arms race and preparations for a cyber war in real earnest in a bid to carry out its military strategy in cyberspace under the pretext of "protecting national interests". The cyber warfare command was organized by the U.S. navy in December, 2002. And this was followed by the formation of cyber warfare units in its air force and army. The U.S. Cyber Command was set up in 2010 to command in a unified manner all the military actions concerning cyber warfare.
					
					 Obama signed a secret presidential order concerning the U.S. cyber operation policy in October 2012. Pursuant to it, the U.S. Department of Defense is developing new type weapons that can jam and paralyze military computer systems of other countries although they are not connected to the internet.
					
					 As seen above, the U.S. is zealously stepping up preparations for large-scale cyber attacks on other countries, blinded by its wild ambition to dominate the world.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, the U.S. cyber military strategy is a thrice-cursed crime as it triggers world-wide race for cyber warfare and throws the world into mayhem.
					
					 The U.S. has often made much fuss over cyber attack to give impression that it is a victim of cyber terrorism.
					
					 For example, it kicked up the racket of "imposing additional sanctions" upon the DPRK after deliberately linking it with the cyber attack on the Sony Pictures Entertainment.
					
					 Such a charade of the U.S. is aimed to create a favorable atmosphere for executing its pre-emptive cyber war by branding sovereign states, notably, the anti-U.S. independent countries, as cyber attackers.
					
					 The U.S., though belatedly, should be well aware of the fact that its wild ambition for dominating the world through cyber warfare is no more than a pipedream.

articles.title: DPRK Will Resolutely Counter S. Korean Puppet Forces' Anti-DPRK Moves: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Resolutely Counter S. Korean Puppet Forces' Anti-DPRK Moves: Rodong Sinmun 
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a commentary blasts the south Korean puppet forces for zealously joining in railroading the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" through the recent 28th session of the UN Human Rights Council.
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The puppet forces were busy hailing the adoption of the "resolution" and expressing "expectation." They behaved ridiculously, talking rubbish about "recommendations." They, at the same time, revealed their design to allow the setting up of the UN "office on the human rights of the north" in Seoul in the foreseeable days.
					
					 There can never be any human rights issue under the Korean-style socialist system centered on the popular masses.
					
					 The DPRK has already clarified that the opportunity of holding north-south dialogue and improving the inter-Korean relations has already been scuppered and there remains only the stand-off by force as the puppet forces have sparked off the campaign for escalating the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north. The recent confessions made by spies who had been on the payroll of the puppet Intelligence Service glaringly laid bare the criminal nature of the anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign. This goes to prove truth that the DPRK can never sit at a negotiating table with the group of thrice-cursed traitors as they are keen to stifle it awake or asleep and that it should boldly retaliate against them with merciless punishment only.
					
					 The DPRK will never pardon the puppet forces going reckless, seized by the wild ambition for "unification of social systems" but strongly react against them. 
					
					 We have already issued a stern warning against the puppet group's move to set up the above-said office in Seoul at any cost. This is not an empty talk.

articles.title: State Academic Degrees and Titles Awarded to Intellectuals
articles.content:
State Academic Degrees and Titles Awarded to Intellectuals
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- State academic degrees and titles were conferred on intellectuals on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The title of academician went to Kim Jae So, researcher at Kim Il Sung University, and the title of candidate academician to Sim Kwang Chol, deputy rector of Phyongsong University of Coal Industry, Song Han Jong, teacher at Wonsan University of Fisheries, and Jo Tae Il, researcher at the Academy of Social Sciences.
					
					 Professorship was awarded to four intellectuals, doctorate to more than 80 and associate professorship to 147.
					
					 They made great contributions to building an economic power and improving the people's living standard by putting different fields of national economy on a modern and IT basis of Korean-style and waging a drive to push back the frontiers of latest science and technology.
					
					 The awarding ceremony took place at the People's Palace of Culture Thursday.

articles.title: Abrogation of SL Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Abrogation of SL Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Internet paper Voice of People in an editorial on Mar. 31 demanded the abrogation of the fascist law indiscriminately suppressing the progressive forces.
					 The editorial recalled that the security authorities hurled repressive force into searching the house of Choe Po Gyong, a teacher of Sansong County, South Kyongsang Province, and his office and are making desperate efforts to give him the verdict of guilty on charge of violation of the "Security Law".
					
					 The Supreme Court admitted that his belongings could not threaten the "basic order of liberal democracy" and gave him a verdict of "not guilty", it said, adding:
					
					 Despite the decision of not guilty, the conservative forces made an appeal to a higher court and have inflicted upon him psychological stress and unbearable pain upon his family over the past seven years.
					
					 His educational activities for peace and reunification have been hamstrung. This is the deplorable reality of south Korea under the reign of the fascist law.
					
					 The editorial called upon all the people to turn out in the actions to have the SL abrogated.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Nigerian Body on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Nigerian Body on Its Website
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" on its website on March 27.
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il all their lives and indicates tasks for firmly preserving and upholding and eternally glorifying their ideas and exploits.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Highly Praised in Kyrgyzstan and DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Highly Praised in Kyrgyzstan and DR Congo
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung were held in Kyrgyzstan and DR Congo on March 26 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (his birth anniversary).
					 A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party of Kyrgyzstan, said in a speech:
					
					 The great Comrade Kim Il Sung is the father of socialist Korea.
					
					 He founded the Juche idea and the Songun idea.
					
					 The Korean people are pushing forward the revolution and construction under the banner of the Juche idea and the Songun idea.
					
					 He founded the Korean People's Army, revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 He founded the Workers' Party of Korea, the force guiding socialist Korea, and the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, genuine people's country.
					
					 It would have been unthinkable without his exploits that Korean socialism has been firmly defended and emerged victorious.
					
					 The chairman of the Association for Implementing the Juche Philosophy of DR Congo noted:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung was the greatest man as he glorified the 20th century through his distinguished ideological and theoretical activities and revolutionary practice.
					
					 He defeated the U.S. imperialists, who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, by leading the army and people of the DPRK with his ever-victorious pluck, stratagem and outstanding leadership and thus instilled confidence and courage into the world progressives. 
					
					 He turned the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliance in national defence with the might of Juche, startling the world and clearly indicating the way for the developing countries to follow.
					
					 The immortal exploits performed by him for the global cause of independence will always be remembered by progressive mankind.

articles.title: Seminar on Work of Kim Jong Un Held in Nigeria
articles.content:
Seminar on Work of Kim Jong Un Held in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A seminar on Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" took place in Nigeria on Mar. 26.
					 Igwanagu Nicholas, chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 Referring to the gist of the work, the reporter noted:
					
					 The Songun revolutionary idea calls for attaching importance and giving priority to the military affairs in the efforts to  accomplish  the popular masses' cause of independence, the cause of socialism, and pushing forward revolution and construction as a whole with the revolutionary army as a main force.
					
					 It is necessary to strengthen the driving force of revolution with the revolutionary army as a main force and push forward the revolution and construction through the leading role of the revolutionary army. This is a new revolutionary theory clarified by the Songun idea.
					
					 Songun politics is a socialist political mode of protecting the country and revolution and socialism and dynamically stepping up the overall socialist construction, regarding military affairs as the most important ones and relying on the People's Army as the core and main forces. It is, at the same time, an independent political mode to which the principles of Songun idea are fully applied.
					
					 The speakers praised leader Kim Jong Il for honorably defending socialism of Juche built by President Kim Il Sung through his Songun revolutionary leadership and laying a solid foundation to achieve the prosperity of Korea and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche and providing a sure guarantee for its victory.
					
					 They also lauded him for opening a turning phase of national reunification and firmly defending the world peace and security.
					
					 They said that Kim Jong Un is adding brilliance to the Songun revolutionary idea and feats of Kim Jong Il, expressing confidence that the DPRK would always win victory, holding aloft the great banner of Songun.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked in Tajikistan, Poland
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked in Tajikistan, Poland
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Meetings to celebrate President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary (the Day of the Sun) were held by the Communist Party of Tajikistan and the Poland-Korea Association on Mar. 27.
					 Displayed at the venues of the meetings were photos showing the feats of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On display there were their works and books and photos introducing the drive of the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Sh. Shabdolov, chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, said in his speech that the President, the father of socialist Korea, founded the Juche idea and ushered in the new era of independence.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The great Comrade Kim Il Sung was an iron-willed brilliant commander who defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists.
					
					 He built the socialist system centered on the popular masses under which the people are masters of everything and everything serves them and developed Korea into the country where free education and healthcare are in force and the people are free from taxes.
					
					 He was, indeed, an extraordinary thinker and theoretician, a great master of outstanding leadership and the sun of mankind.
					
					 Slaboy January Guzowski, chairman of the C.C., the Poland-Korea Association, and other speakers said that the President's ardent patriotism and his spirit of devoted service to his people serve as a noble model for the world progressives.
					
					 They referred to the fact that the President also made a great contribution to the development of the friendly relations between the two countries and paid highest tribute to him who made a great contribution to the human cause of independence on the occasion of his birth anniversary. 
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting held in Poland.

articles.title: British Bodies Call for Ending U.S. Colonial Domination over S. Korea
articles.content:
British Bodies Call for Ending U.S. Colonial Domination over S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK issued a joint statement on Mar. 22 in support of the white paper of the National Reunification Institute "South Korea is a complete colony of the U.S." exposing the deplorable reality of south Korea, a colony of the U.S., and the disgusting behavior of the sycophants of the U.S. and the traitors.
					 The statement said south Korea is a peculiar colony in the 21st century, the era of independence, adding:
					
					 GIs in south Korea are enjoying extraterritorial privileges and committing all sorts of crimes such as murder and rape.
					
					 The U.S. embassy in south Korea is not a simple embassy but the government-general in the colony.
					
					 The embassy has thrown a dense network of intelligence and surveillance not only in Chongwadae, regime and "National Assembly" but also in all fabrics of the south Korean society. It is acting as the general headquarters for the ruling machinery in south Korea and the government-general in the colony.
					
					 The U.S. ambassador plays the role of the governor general in the colony.
					
					 The U.S. deprived the south Korean puppet army, its colonial mercenary forces, of the prerogative of command over it.
					
					 The U.S. is putting under its complete control the south Korean economy depending on foreign forces.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime is making south Korea increasingly dependent on the U.S. and playing the role of a shock brigade for carrying out its scenario for invading the north.
					
					 It is our view that now is the time to put an end to the U.S. colonial domination over south Korea.
					
					 Such sycophant of the U.S. and traitor as Park Geun Hye must step down at once.

articles.title: Demo in Britain Protests U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises and "Human Rights" Campaign
articles.content:
Demo in Britain Protests U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises and "Human Rights" Campaign
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A demonstration took place before the south Korean embassy in London on Mar. 26 in protest against the provocative U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises and their "human rights" campaign against the DPRK.
					 It was attended by personages of the New Communist Party of Britain, the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Korean Friendship Association UK and the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain and citizens.
					
					 Prior to the demonstration speeches were made.
					
					 Dermot Hudson, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association UK, said the U.S. imperialists and their south Korean puppets are going reckless staging the large-scale joint military exercises against the DPRK, the motherland of the Juche idea and fortress of socialism and independence.
					
					 The exercises are described as "annual" and "defensive", sophism no one can believe, he said.
					
					 He condemned the U.S. and its south Korean puppet forces for cooking up the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" in order to stifle socialist Korea.
					
					 He urged the U.S. and its south Korean puppet forces to immediately cease all their military drills and smear campaigns aimed to hurt the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK and threaten the peace and security of the Korean peninsula and the region.
					
					 Then the demonstrators chanted slogans such as "Let us defend the DPRK!" and "Overthrow the south Korean puppet regime!", carrying the DPRK flags and placards with the emblem of the Korean Friendship Association UK.
					
					 They gave the passers-by handouts condemning the joint military drills and "human rights" campaign.

articles.title: RPDC informa a parte japonesa su posicion sobre grave provocacion politica
articles.content:
RPDC informa a parte japonesa su posicion sobre grave provocacion politica
Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ACNC) -- En relacion con que ultimamente, sobrepasan el limite la grave provocacion politica de Japon y sus atentados contra la soberania estatal de la RPDC, esta remitio el dia 2 por via diplomatica un aviso a la parte japonesa para exponerle su posicion al respecto.
					La nota refiere que la RPDC implementa con sinceridad el Acuerdo Corea-Japon de Estocolmo, y prosigue:
					
					Violando el acuerdo de solucionar entre ambas partes el problema de secuestro, Japon lo internacionaliza como un enfoque en el escenario de DDHH de la ONU, lo cual hace imposible confiar en el.
					
					Condenamos categoricamente el inaudito atentado contra la soberania estatal de la RPDC cometido recientemente por los policias japoneses al registrar forzada e ilegalmente las casas de los cuadros de la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon) quienes son diputados a la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC. 
					
					Demandamos al gobierno japones que investigue consecuentemente ese incidente y pida disculpas. 
					
					Bajo tales circunstancias, sera imposible sostener las conversaciones intergubernamentales RPDC-Japon.

articles.title: FPNC planea investigacion conjunta de aves migratorias con fondo extranjero
articles.content:
FPNC planea investigacion conjunta de aves migratorias con fondo extranjero
Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ACNC) -- La Federacion de Proteccion de la Naturaleza de Corea tiene el plan de abrir en mayo una investigacion conjunta con el Fondo de Naturaleza Miranda de Nueva Zelanda, segun el acuerdo firmado por ambas partes en el 103 (2014) de la Era Juche.
					De acuerdo con un funcionario interesado, la investigacion tendra lugar en Nampho y Onchon.
					
					Los miembros del fondo neozelandes aprovecharan esa oportunidad para proteger las aves migratorias reconocidas en escala mundial como las en peligro de extincion y confirmar exactamente la ruta de migracion de ellas.
					
					Se llevo a cabo en abril de 2009 la anterior investigacion del fondo en Corea que deviene un destino importante de la ruta de traslado de aves migratorias Asia Oriental-Australia.

articles.title: Desarrolladas en Corea sustancias analiticas estandar
articles.content:
Desarrolladas en Corea sustancias analiticas estandar
Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ACNC) -- El Instituto Central de Experimento Analitico de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias de la RPDC desarrollo recientemente decenas de tipos de sustancias analiticas estandar.
					Ellas satisfacen los indices tecnicos  establecidos por la Organizacion Internacional de Estandardizacion (ISO).
					
					De acuerdo con Ri Kun Sam, subdirector del Instituto, los valores caracteristicos de las sustancias son certificados como los de nivel mundial segun la doble prueba de comparacion hecha por ILAC.

articles.title: ACNC comenta "confesion franca" de ciber-terrorista no.1
articles.content:
ACNC comenta "confesion franca" de ciber-terrorista no.1
Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ACNC) -- En el seminario efectuado el 17 de marzo bajo auspicios del Centro Norteamericano para los Estudios Estrategicos e Internacionales, el presidente del comite de seguridad del territorio nacional de la Camara de Representantes de Estados Unidos dijo sin escrupulos que su pais fue autor de ataque cibernetico contra el Internet de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ocurrido en diciembre del ano pasado. 
					Desde hace varios anos, EE.UU. comete los actos de espionaje de toda indole infiltrandose en la red de computadoras de la RPDC para recoger las informaciones sobre el desarrollo nuclear y otros. 
					
					Tales hechos se dieron a la publicidad por los documentos confidenciales de la Agencia de Seguridad Nacional (ASN), los testimonios de las ex autoridades del gobierno y los medios de prensa de EE.UU. 
					
					El terrorismo cibernetico de EE.UU. toma por sus blancos casi todos los paises y regiones del mundo, entre otros, los paises antiyanquis, Rusia, China y otras potencias regionales y los aliados rivales como Alemania.
					
					En 2010, EE.UU. asesto con el virus Stuxnet el primer ataque cibernetico de nivel estatal contra el programa nuclear de una planta nuclear de Iran.
